name: Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated
summary: Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated (JLL) is a leading global real estate services and investment management firm, headquartered in Chicago, with more than 112,000 employees in 80 countries. JLL provides integrated services including investment management, asset management, leasing, property management, development, and technology solutions for clients worldwide. The company is ranked 193 on the Fortune 500 and is recognized for its operational excellence, growth orientation, and commitment to sustainability.
